title: Freshersworld Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape fresher and graduate job listings from Freshersworld.com - India's leading job portal. Extract job titles, companies, locations, salaries, experience requirements, and full descriptions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Specific Freshersworld URL to scrape (overrides keyword/location filters). Example: https://www.freshersworld.com/jobs/category/it-software-job-vacancies
startUrl.sectionDescription: Define your job search criteria. Use either Start URL or filter parameters below.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Search keywords for job title or skills. Examples: 'Software Developer', 'Data Analyst', 'Marketing Executive'

location.title: Location
location.description: City or region to filter jobs. Examples: 'Bangalore', 'Mumbai', 'Delhi', 'Chennai', 'Hyderabad', 'Pune'

category.title: Job Category
category.description: Filter by job category. Examples: 'IT/Software', 'MBA', 'Core Technical', 'BPO', 'Banking'

experience.title: Experience Level
experience.description: Filter by experience requirement. Examples: 'Freshers', '0-1 years', '1-3 years', '3-5 years'

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job page to extract complete description, skills, and application details. Disable for faster but limited data.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect. Set higher for comprehensive data extraction.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on search result pages to crawl. Each page contains ~20 jobs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy servers for reliable scraping. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
